segments.text: I notice the girl standing next to the boy, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so eager, like she’s done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s the lookout, making sure the woman doesn’t turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach the jar, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it this time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and the girl doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t make a mess with those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to regret this if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s eyes are fixed on the jar, and she’s ready to grab one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how bold they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR
